This question involves understanding the principles of physics and mechanical advantage. When pushing a box up a ramp, the angle of the ramp affects the amount of force required to move the box. A higher angle (steeper incline) means the ramp is more difficult to push the box up compared to a lower angle. Therefore, option (D) is the correct answer.

Option (A) is incorrect because a lighter box would actually make it easier to push up the ramp. Option (B) is unrelated to the difficulty of pushing the box. Option (C) is also unrelated because the volume of the box does not affect the force required to push it up a ramp.

This question requires understanding of the concept of mechanical advantage and how it relates to inclined planes. When pushing a box up a ramp, the angle of the ramp affects the effort required to move the box. A higher angle ramp would mean a steeper incline, which requires more force to push the box up. Therefore, if Eric finds it more difficult to push the box up the ramp, it suggests that the ramp has a higher angle than it did earlier. Option (A) is incorrect because a lighter box would actually make it easier to push. Option (B) is irrelevant to the difficulty of pushing the box. Option (C) is unrelated to the angle of the ramp and its impact on the effort required.

Option (C) is also unrelated, as the volume of the box does not affect the force required to push it up the ramp.

Option (C) is also irrelevant as the volume of the box does not affect the force required to move it up the ramp. Thus, the correct answer is (D) because a steeper or higher angle of the ramp would make it more difficult to push the box up.

Option (C) mentions the volume of the box, but again, volume does not directly affect the difficulty to push. Option (D), however, suggests that the ramp has become steeper or has a higher angle than before. This change in the incline of the ramp would indeed make it more difficult for Eric to push the box up as he would have to exert more force against gravity. Therefore, the correct answer is (D).
